messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: My name is David Coburn your UKIP MEP for Scotland and general election candidate for Falkirk. Last year people here voted for me to represent them in Brussels and now I am asking you to do so again and elect me to Westminster. Falkirk has been let down and taken for granted by Labour and the SNP and deserves real representation. I will fight for Falkirk's interests but I will do my fighting in Westminster's chamber not in its bars. Make a difference - vote David Coburn and UKIP on May 7th.

images.caption: David Coburn in Falkirk - Standing Up for Real Change
